post.text: The Rachel Maddow Show walks through some of the best moments of Hillary's spectacular foreign policy speech: "She is not caricaturing Donald Trump...she's just quoting him directly, and that's deadly."

comment.author: Daniel
comment.text: I heard Rachel Maddow might be voting for Trump, is this true? Not many democrats will vote for Hillary and be proud of their vote. If they vote for her, they won't admit it.

replies.author: Jarek
replies.text: that is a retarded statement. Hillary supporters are in the millions and every single one of us is proud to say we have voted for her and will do so again. Rachel is most certainly not a trumpster either.

replies.author: Jacob

replies.author: Daniel
replies.text: Jacob, I'm trying to figure out why anyone would vote for Hillary. Just a few reasons. Obviously it doesn't bother some of you that her life is full of scandals, lies, and corruption?
